channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump defeats Kamala Harris to win 2024 presidential election
item.description: Republican nominee Donald Trump will defeat Democratic nominee Kamala Harris in the 2024 presidential race, NBC News projects.

item.title: Trading as a side hustle?
item.description: Good evening, For most of us, trading is a side hustle. Quite often, members ask me if they should go full-time. Here‚Äôs my opinion. Traders who can tr...

item.title: European stocks up 1% as global investors react to Trump win; Novo Nordisk up 5%
item.description: European stocks continued to gain momentum Wednesday after Donald Trump defeated his Democrat rival Kamala Harris in the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: ‚ÄòIt strikes me as vengeful‚Äô: My friend wants to boycott a coffee shop because of the owner‚Äôs political views. Is this what America has become?
item.description: ‚ÄúThere was a pile-on of hate and jubilance at the thought of putting this man out of business.‚Äù

item.title: Trump Media shares surge more than 30% as Trump wins presidential election

item.title: Bitcoin surges to a record $75,000 as Trump victory heralds wider crypto adoption and weaker regulation

item.title: Trump declares victory hours before clearing Electoral College threshold against Harris
item.description: Donald Trump with a victory in Wisconsin secured enough Electoral College votes to defeat Kamala Harris in the White House race.

item.title: What the Trump win means for the mega-cap tech giants, according to this high-profile analyst
item.description: Shifts in the White House attitude to AI, regulation and electric vehicles may have a big impact on big tech.

item.title: Tesla jumps nearly 15% as Trump-backer Musk seen benefiting from White House win
